name: UrlWatch
short_description: Monitor websites for changes and receive notifications on updates.
description: Monitor websites for changes and receive notifications on updates. UrlWatch is a self-hosted application focused on utility, monitoring, dashboard, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host UrlWatch on your home server to monitor websites for changes and receive notifications on updates without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use UrlWatch to manage your utility workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
